explains: adj. 自愿接受的；自己强加的；自己规定的

sentences.en: He returned home after eleven years of self-imposed exile.
sentences.cn: 经历了11年的自我流放后他回家了。

sentences.en: Some are self-imposed and come from my own ignoranceof realities.
sentences.cn: 而另一些则是自我强加的，来源于对自身现实的无知。

sentences.en: The OBR judges that the chancellor will meet his self-imposed fiscal targets.
sentences.cn: OBR判断财政大臣将达成他制定的每一个财政年度目标。
